modal.message: Per aggiungere questo prodotto al tuo carrello, prego selezionare le varianti.

errors.insufficientstock: Sorry, this product is currently out of stock.

product.tax_disclaimer: * IVA inclusa più le spese di spedizione, se applicabile

available.at: Disponibile il {startDate, date, DD} {startDate, date, MMM} alle ore {startDate, time, short}
available.until: Disponibile fino a {endDate, date, DD} {endDate, date, MMM} alle ore {endDate, time, short}

locations.headline: Negozi vicino a te
locations.who_will_pickup: Who will pick up this order?
locations.success_copy: We will send you an email/text message shortly when your order is ready for pickup.
locations.error_title: We're sorry but your reservation could not be placed.
locations.error_copy: There was an issue when trying to place your reservation. Probably some items have sold out meanwhile. Please check availability at a different location.
locations.error_invalid_zip_code: Please enter a valid ZIP code.
locations.error_no_store_found: We don’t have any stores matching this location, please check your inputs.

method.ropis: Reserve online pickup in store / curbside
method.bopis: Buy online pickup in store / curbside

fulfillment.heading: Availability
fulfillment.ropis: Reserve online pickup in store / curbside
fulfillment.bopis: Buy online pickup in store / curbside

error.direct_ship: This combination is not available for direct ship, select a different option or check if it's available at a store near you.
error.reserve: This product is not available at your chosen location. Please select a different location.
error.not_ready: Please choose a preferred location you want to order to.

no_result.heading: Ops!
no_result.body: La tua ricerca "{searchPhrase}" ha prodotto 0 risultati.

modal.body_error: Si è verificato un errore imprevisto. Riprova per favore.

cart.coupon_was_added: Il coupon è stato aggiunto al carrello!
cart.coupons_not_supported: Aggiungi i coupon e buoni regalo alla cassa
cart.reservation_hint: * Prices may vary from store to store and online. For Reserve Online orders certain state and local fees may not be reflected in the total. {shopName} is not responsible for the errors or omissions in pricing and quality.

errors.insufficientstock: One or more products in the cart are out of stock. Please remove the products and try again.
errors.productsNotFound: One or more products has been removed from your cart due to unavailability.
errors.mixed_cart: We currently do not support Ship to Address and Reserve to Cart within the same transaction. Please update your delivery options and continue shopping or proceed to checkout.
errors.direct_ship_item: Check if this item is available for reserve at a store near you.
errors.ropis_cart_inventory: Not all of your items can be reserved. Please check the products in cart and change fulfillment options.
errors.ropis_item_inventory: This item is not available for reservation at the selected location. Check for availability at a different location.
errors.ropis_item_inventory_exceed: This item is not available in the desired quantity at {storeName}. {inventory} will be reserved.
errors.mixed_cart_coupon_removed: The coupon "{code}" is not valid for in store reservations. Once you have placed the reservation it will be available for direct ship orders again.

login.headline: Benvenuto/a
login.forgot_password_popup: Usa il sito web del desktop per resettare la password prego.
login.error: I tuoi nome utente e password non corrispondono ad alcun account

reset_password.subline: Please enter your Email to initiate the password reset process.
reset_password.reset_instructions: Password Reset instructions have been sent to {email}
reset_password.customer_not_found: We couldn't find an account for this email address

reviews.no_reviews: Vota prima degli altri questo prodotto:

reviews.press_to_rate_with_x_stars: Premere per votare con {rate} {rate, plural, =1 {stella} other {stelle}}.

scanner.instructions: Per favore mantieni il codice a barre o il codice QR nel centro. La lettura è effettuata automaticamente.

noResult.qrCode: Non siamo riusciti a trovare alcun risultato per questo codice QR.

access_denied.camera_message: Questa funzione richiede l'accesso alla tua fotocamera. Consenti l'accesso nelle impostazioni per favore.
access_denied.geolocation_message: Per trovare negozi vicino a te, vai su Impostazioni e abilita i permessi di accesso alla localizzazione.

errors.genericInitialize: Checkout is currently unavailable, please try again later.
errors.genericUpdate: Failed to process order, please try again later.
errors.genericSubmit: Failed to complete order, please try again later.

pickup_contact.headline: Pickup Contact Info
pickup_contact.subheadline: We'll send your order confirmation to this email and use the following phone number only if we have questions.

form.who_will_pickup: Who will pick up this order?

success.title: Thank you!
success.instructions_1: Below you will find your order details. For questions regarding your order, contact the store that received your reservation.
success.instructions_2: Please note pickup dates may vary because of holidays and weekends. Check your store's hours below for the most accurate pickup time.

errors.authorize: This order doesn't belong to your account.
